meanings.definition: Of or relating to an antrum.
meanings.sent1: The antral opening allowed air to flow through.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the antral cavity carefully.
meanings.sent3: The antral echo made the room sound like a concert hall.
meanings.sent4: Her antral smile lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The antral colors of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.

meanings.definition: Located in or pertaining to an antrum.
meanings.sent1: The antral fluid helped with digestion.
meanings.sent2: The antral cells were responsible for producing mucus.
meanings.sent3: The antral dance troupe performed in the narrow space.
meanings.sent4: His antral thoughts echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The antral aroma of the bakery drew in customers from afar.
